verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4427>reigns!<s%> Let the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H7264>tremble.<s%> He <S%H3427>sits<s%> enthroned among the <S%H3742>cherubim.<s%> Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H5120>moved.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion.<s%> He is <S%H7311>high<s%> above all the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
Let them <S%H3034>praise<s%> your <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%> He is <S%H6918>Holy!<s%>

The <S%H4428>King<s%>'s <S%H5797>strength<s%> also <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%> You do <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H4339>equity.<s%> You <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were among his <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> among those who <S%H7121>call<s%> on his <S%H8034>name;<s%> they <S%H7121>called<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and he answered <S%H6030>them.<s%>
He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them in the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud.<s%> They <S%H8104>kept<s%> his <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> the <S%H2706>statute<s%> that he gave <S%H5414>them.<s%>

You <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3068>them,<s%> Yahweh our <S%H430>God.<s%> You are a <S%H410>God<s%> who <S%H5375>forgave<s%> <S%H5358>them,<s%> although you took vengeance for their <S%H5949>doings.<s%>
<S%H7311>Exalt<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H7812>Worship<s%> at his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> is <S%H6918>holy!<s%>
